shri lanka krikat aayathanaye nawa sabhapathi lesa jayantha dharmadasa mahatha nam kirima ha ehi idiri piyawara walakwamin athuru waranayak kolambaa disthrik krikat sangamaya kolambaa disa adhikaranayen illa siti namuth winisuru amal ranaraja mahatha wagauththarakara pakshayata nothisi nikuth kaleya.kolambaa disthrik krikat sangamaye sabhapathi anthani chulananda ha lekam bandhula thilak disanayaka mahathwaru mema waranaya illa sitiyaha.krikat sabhapathi upali dharmadasa mahatha athulu widhayaka kamituwa wagauththarakaruwan washayen nam kara thibini.wadidura wibhagaya labana ata wanidata kal thabini.
